data.text: @myviewontopic what the actual fuck does one have to do with the other, narcissists?
@myviewontopic Why isn't freezing and starving at the heart of recovery?
@myviewontopic @Rosmoffat Allegorical to the Wizzard of Oz characters, in many ways, in jumbled ways. I hope she wakes up in her home in Portugal & stays there, one of these fine days.
@myviewontopic Not even pretending that independence matters to her.
@scarycath @andrewgmorton @myviewontopic Too late for that. Women know where she stands on this issue.
@andrewgmorton @myviewontopic I think this time she means sex rather than gender, angling to save some votes in May?

@myviewontopic She might as well say say that the fight against poverty must be at the heart of the post-Covid recovery, it’s an issue that affects far more people. She’s just virtue signalling for Stonewall points.

@myviewontopic The gender equality party 
SNP no more 🤔 wee bit of a contradiction when I can easily get into what were womens safe spaces if I was so inclined!
